mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID) FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEMS_TAGS T ON I.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_ID WHERE T.TAG_ID = #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, I.IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEMS_TAGS T ON T.TAG_ID = #{criteria} WHERE I.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_ID ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT LABEL, "DESC", IMAGE, CATEGORY, STOCK, PRICE FROM ( SELECT I.LABEL, I."DESC", I.IMAGE, I.CATEGORY, I.STOCK, I.PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ORDER_COUNT DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN (SELECT ITEM_ID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM ORDERS GROUP BY ITEM_ID) M ON I.ITEM_ID = M.ITEM_ID ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{start};
SELECT * FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, I.IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY I.REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS I) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
